#!/bin/bash -eu
# Setup env vars and folders for the script cd $(dirname ${BASH_SOURCE[0]})/.. JOB_NAME=$(basename $PWD) JOB_DIR=/var/vcap/jobs/$JOB_NAME
source $JOB_DIR/helpers/ctl_setup.sh $JOB_NAME 'haproxy'
case $1 in
start) pid_guard $PIDFILE $JOB_NAME
# kill nginx if bosh hasn't killed it $JOB_DIR/bin/nginx_ctl NGINX_PID_FILE="$RUN_DIR/nginx.pid" echo "check if nginx process still exists" if [ -e "$NGINX_PID_FILE" ]; then echo "pid file still exists: KILL 'zombie' nginx process $NGINX_PID_FILE $(cat $NGINX_PID_FILE)" kill -9 $(cat "$NGINX_PID_FILE") || : # do not rise an error if the process does not exist rm $NGINX_PID_FILE || : fi kill -9 $(ps -ax | pgrep nginx) || : # kill any nginx daemon process survived
# store pid in $PIDFILE echo $$ > $PIDFILE
# don't setuidgid as 'vcap:vcap' because haproxy starts as root to listen on port 80 exec chpst /var/vcap/packages/haproxy/bin/haproxy -C $JOB_DIR/config/haproxy/ -f haproxy.config -p "${PIDFILE}" \ >>$LOG_DIR/haproxy.stdout.log \ 2>>$LOG_DIR/haproxy.stderr.log
;;
stop) kill_and_wait $PIDFILE
;; *) echo "Usage: $0 {start|stop}"
;;
esac exit 0
